item.title: Ruby vs Crystal Performance
item.description: I’ve been hearing about the Crystal programming language here and there over the last couple of years but never had a chance to give it a look until yesterday. What is Crystal? It’s a statically type, compiled, object-oriented language with syntax heavily inspired by Ruby’s.
